header.title: Om | Kristian Nielsen Webudvikling
header.description: Kort beskrivelse af Kristian Nielsens evner og baggrund.

paragraph-one.part-one: I'm a selftaught developer specialising in frontend and web development. I started learning programming and web development in 2020, and have played around with game development with
paragraph-one.part-three: , but now I've found a true passion in web development with

paragraph-two.part-one: Residing in the southern Chinese trade capital of
paragraph-two.part-two: , I have gained valuable experience with language, cultural differences, and what appeals to users inside and outside of Denmark.

tooltip.godot: The Godot Game Engine is a cross-platform, free, and open-source software. It is designed to create 2D and 3D games for computers, Android, and iOS, among others.
tooltip.python: Python is a general-purpose programming language used by data analysts, artificial intelligence developers, and more. Python's design philosophy is characterized by a high degree of code readability. Python is often ranked as one of the most popular programming languages.
tooltip.javascript: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that, along with HTML and CSS, constitutes the core technologies of browsers and thus the internet outwardly. 98% of all websites use JavaScript to modify content and appearance. It should not be confused with the programming language Java.
tooltip.guangzhou: Guangzhou is the administrative center of the Guangdong region in the People's Republic of China, and with its 18,676,605 inhabitants, it is one of the largest cities in China. The Guangzhou-Foshan metropolitan area is the third most populous urban area in China with 19,075,000 inhabitants. Guangzhou is located on the coast facing the South China Sea.
